page.title: 04OUR SCHOOL BY P.1.
page.content: Crieff Primary School is situated in Commissioner Street. It was built nearly 150 years ago. The first recorded date on the stonework is 1874 and 1938.It is a very large building with concrete playgrounds to the front,side and back.There are 28 rooms.At present 14 of the rooms are used as classrooms.There is a large gymnasium,a library/music room,an art/sewing room,and a televison.There are 3 offices which are used by the headteacher the A.H.T and the secreteary.There is a medical room which is also used by the dentist.The speech therapist and the remedical teacher each have a room.There is a staffroom and 2 rooms are used by a local playgroup.There is also a changing room which is used by the older boys.
